titles.title: Christ the Lord is risen today

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ the Lord is risen today, Alleluia! Earth and heaven in chorus say, Alleluia! Raise your joys and triumphs high, Alleluia! Sing, ye heavens, and earth reply, Alleluia!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lives again our glorious King, Alleluia! Where, O death, is now thy sting? Alleluia! Once he died our souls to save, Alleluia! Where's thy victory, boasting grave? Alleluia!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love's redeeming work is done, Alleluia! Fought the fight, the battle won, Alleluia! Death in vain forbids him rise, Alleluia! Christ has opened paradise, Alleluia!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soar we now where Christ has led, Alleluia! Following our exalted Head, Alleluia! Made like him, like him we rise, Alleluia! Ours the cross, the grave, the skies, Alleluia!{/lang-eng}
